title: Artportable Exhibitions and showroom
exhibitionText: Every week a new artist exhibits with us at Artportable. We do not exclude any artistic expressions, and there is something for all tastes and budgets. Painting, sculpture, photo or handicraft - discover art all year round in Artportable's physical gallery on Södermalm in Stockholm. Artportable's brilliant artists also adorn the walls of Stockholm Fisk, Art bakery NK, Ångbåtsbryggan, PS Matsal, LA Piazza and Art Café - NK
welcomeText: You are welcome to visit Artportable at Åsögatan 176!
